text:
I cannot get the mailtask to work on ant 1.5beta2 and 1.6alpha. It results in 
a NPE in Message.print(). The exact same xml works perfectly with 1.4.1. I 
tried keeping just the bare minimum attributes, always the same.

Java 1.4.0_01
Windows NT
mail.jar & activation.jar in ant's lib dir
